originalText.text: I had hyperhdrosis for my entire life and it was really bad and really took a toll on my mental health. I thought it couldn’t be cured and I would have to live this way forever, and constantly felt uncomfortable in my own skin, I felt like the older I got the worse it got and it made me super depressed. I was originally supposed to get this procedure done in California however it wasn’t working out for me, luckily I found Dr. Gorenstein who did the same procedure and I finally got it done and I’ve need been happier. Now at 20 years old I have dry warm hands and would highly recommend anyone in my position to do it because it truly is life changing.

I was originally supposed to get this procedure done in California however it wasn’t working out for me, luckily I found Dr. Gorenstein who did the same procedure and I finally got it done and I’ve need been happier. Now at 20 years old I have dry warm hands and would highly recommend anyone in my position to do it because it truly is life changing.

originalText.text: My daughter is 13 and was having so many issues with excessive hand sweating. She had to wear gloves to do homework, was always embarrassed when she went anywhere scared that someone was going to ask to shake hands. She had the ETS surgery with Dr Gorenstein and now she has no hand sweating and she has no compensatory sweating either. She’s so excited to be able to put lotion on. People don’t understand how life changing this procedure can be. We are so happy with the results. Also they made it super easy for us, we just called and they did all the work with the insurance. The staff is always super nice and treated my daughter like a princess on surgery day. From the nurses to the surgeon to the anesthesiologist. We loved everyone. No complaints would 100% recommend this procedure and doctor to anyone looking

originalText.text: Dr Gorenstein preformed ETS surgery for my palmar hyperhydrosis and it was the best decision I’ve ever made. My hands were dry right out of surgery, and continue to be. The recovery was short and tolerable. The compensatory sweating is VERY minimal and not problematic. I would recommend this procedure to anyone who is letting their Hyperhidrosis effect their daily life. I seen serval reviews  prior to going here, about feeling rushed into surgery, however from the start I never got that feeling. My first appointment with Dr Gorenstein he took the time to go through ALL of my options, not just surgical options. I wish I would have gotten the procedure done sooner! It was an overall great experience. Everyone in the recovery area was wonderful. Dr Gorenstein’s scheduler, Sabina is amazing and very responsive as well. They have a great team!!!

originalText.text: Hello everyone, My experience with Dr.Gorenstein in incredible. My hands are completely dry after just 1 week of the ETS surgery. The staff was wonderful, very nice the assistant was the most comfortable person to talk to and very smart too. To everyone that is suffering with hyperhidrosis I totally recommend it!
